meanings.sent1: I need to finalize my homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: She will finalize the project by the end of the week.
meanings.sent3: After many tries, I finally finalize my puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The chef will finalize the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent5: The artist took hours to finalize the painting with intricate details.

meanings.definition: To make a final decision or agreement.
meanings.sent1: Let's finalize our plans for the weekend getaway.
meanings.sent2: The committee will finalize the budget during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: I always struggle to finalize what to order at the restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The judge will finalize the verdict after hearing all the evidence.
meanings.sent5: It's important to finalize the contract details before signing.

meanings.definition: To put the finishing touches on something.
meanings.sent1: The designer will finalize the dress with elegant embroidery.
meanings.sent2: Before the event, they need to finalize the decorations.
meanings.sent3: I rush to finalize my makeup before leaving the house.
meanings.sent4: The florist will finalize the bouquet with a beautiful ribbon.
meanings.sent5: To finalize the cake, she added the perfect frosting swirls.
